name: Escape From The Darkness (Muhtasim Ishmam)
description:
"ESCAPE FROM THE DARKNESS" IS A 2D THRILLER AND SURVIVAL 

SHOOTER GAME WHERE YOU HAVE TO FIND KEYS TO ESCAPE FROM

 THE DARKNESS AND KILL THE ENEMIES TO SURVIVE

USE WASD FOR MOVEMENT

AIM WITH THE MOUSE POINTER AND SHOOT WITH

THE LEFT MOUSE BUTTON

YOU HAVE TO FIND FIVE KEYS AND GET AT LEAST 69 KILLS TO WIN THE GAME

YOU HAVE A LIMITED AMMOUNT OF BATTERY SO DONT FORGET TO COLLECT THEM

ENJOY
